SEARCH
Package sm.sgp.graficos

Class AbstractShape

java.lang.Object
sm.sgp.graficos.AbstractShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shape
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractShapeFilled, MiFantasma, MiLinea
public abstract class AbstractShape extends Object implements Shape
Clase abstracta que representa una forma geométrica y proporciona funcionalidades comunes.
